column4: Im using 7.10 - almost everything works, but, the intel cs330 usb web cam is not working..  the hardware was not recognized.. all there is a /dev/video0 - its not recognizing the usb cam hardware -
You can look at our webcam help page as well as supported hardware page...
Hopefully you did not try things like automatix or envy (both really bad ideas) to try and get it going
I dont have a cam...  No one want to see that...  would you like the cam help page type !webcam | LermanetDOTcom
